Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Provides WTC-related benefits to certain employees who worked at the Verrazano Bridge Toll Facility
Summary: Provides WTC-related benefits to certain employees who worked at the Verrazano Bridge Toll Facility.
LawCode: Amd ยง2, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to providing WTC-related benefits to certain employees who worked at the Verrazano Bridge Toll Facility
